title: SATCOM Functional Handset
explain: SATCOM functional handset supports satellite communication and ground mobile communication (2G), which is configured with keyboard and adopts high capacity battery and three-proof design to satisfy the operation in atrocious environment.
form:
Main Specifications
Operation networksatellite mobile communication
ServiceVoice（1.2kbps/2.4kbps/4kbps）, data（1.2kbps~9.6kbps） and short message
Navigation positioningBeidou/GPS
Operational temperature-40℃~55℃
Communication-on-the-move” antennasupporting automatic alignment to satellite and automatic tracking
